entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
